# FayasTech Next.js Portfolio - Development Instructions

## Project Overview
Modern Next.js 14 portfolio with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, and Vercel optimization.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 14 (App Router)
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- **Animations**: Framer Motion
- **Images**: next/image with optimization
- **Deployment**: Vercel

## Development Guidelines
- Use React Server Components where possible
- Implement lazy loading with React Suspense
- Optimize images with next/image
- Create responsive, mobile-first design
- Follow accessibility best practices

## Component Structure
- Hero section with modern animations
- About section with interactive elements
- Portfolio showcase with lazy loading
- Contact form with validation
- Navigation with smooth scrolling

## Performance Goals
- Lighthouse score 95+
- Core Web Vitals: All green
- Image optimization: WebP/AVIF
- Bundle optimization: Tree shaking
